## PlayerEventMap type

Player 事件类型

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PlayerEventMap = {
    frameloaded: {
        isSuccess: boolean;
        time: number;
        index: number;
        current: number;
        total: number;
        player: Player;
    };
    loaded: {
        player: Player;
        total: number;
    };
    tick: {
        player: Player;
        frame: number;
    };
    play: {
        player: Player;
    };
    pause: {
        player: Player;
    };
};
```
